titles.title: Investment Tax Credit Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the 10 percent regular investment tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/1/1994--Introduced. Investment Tax Credit Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate the ten-percent investment tax credit for property used as an integral part of manufacturing, production, or extraction or of furnishing transportation, communications, electrical energy, gas, water, and sewage disposal services.
